verbose_text: beta - Galf is synthesized from its precursor UDP-galactose (UDP-Gal) by the enzyme UDP-galactopyranose mutase (UGM), inhibition of which is known to regulate parasitic virulence and hence is an attractive target [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: beta - Galf is synthesized from its precursor UDP-galactose (UDP-Gal) by the enzyme UDP-galactopyranose mutase
